hero_heading: Dikat Al Waqt provides reliable transportation services within the Kingdom.
hero_description: With over 20 years of experience in transporting individuals and groups within and between Saudi cities, we offer exceptional service for pilgrims and visitors, supported by a modern fleet operating around the clock.

our_mission.title: Our Mission
our_mission.description: Providing safe and reliable transportation services within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, with a modern fleet and 24-hour availability, with special care for the comfort of pilgrims and visitors in Makkah, Madinah, and Jeddah.

about_us.subtitle: About Us
about_us.title: Professional transportation with local expertise and trusted quality.
about_us.description: At Diqat Al Waqt, we provide safe and flexible transportation services for individuals and visitors within and between cities across the Kingdom. With over 20 years of experience, we offer a comfortable travel experience for pilgrims, visitors, and residents—featuring a modern fleet, professional drivers, and 24/7 service availability.

cards.title: Airport & Intercity Transport
cards.description: Reliable pickups and drop-offs from Jeddah, Madinah, and Riyadh airports. We also offer smooth, secure travel between cities with modern vehicles, professional drivers, and full-time availability to match your schedule.

cards.title: Pilgrim & Visitor Service
cards.description: Tailored transportation for pilgrims and visitors within Makkah and Madinah. We ensure flexibility in timing, comfort in travel, and a respectful experience that considers religious rituals and sacred locations.

cards.title: City Transportation & Rentals
cards.description: Explore the city with ease through hourly chauffeur services, event transfers, or guided local tours. Our in-city rides are fast, reliable, and comfortable — ideal for business, leisure, or special occasions.

why_us.title: Why You Need To Choose Us

cards.title: Special care for pilgrims and visitors
cards.description: We serve visitors of Mecca and Medina with expertise and professionalism, offering precise knowledge of locations, hotels, and schedules.

cards.title: A modern and comfortable fleet
cards.description: We provide fully equipped private cars and minibuses to ensure the comfort and safety of passengers on all trips.

cards.title: 24-hour service.
cards.description: Travel with us anytime, within cities or between them, with direct WhatsApp support and instant response

cards.title: Professional drivers and competitive prices.
cards.description: Our team of drivers is trained and dedicated, providing high-quality service at fair, transparent prices with no surprises.

footer.slogan: We reach you on time and serve you with trust.
footer.title: Request More Information
footer.description: Do you want to book a trip, rent a car, check prices, or inquire about transportation services within the Kingdom?
footer.rights_reserved: All Rights Reserved © {{year}} Dikat Al Wakt

cars.section_description: Choose from our premium selection of vehicles for your next journey
